item.title: Thieving cape help
item.dc:creator: @young_pure42 young pure42
item.description:
@young_pure42 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=DivineSouls link=topic=449836.msg3300034#msg3300034 date=1281228455]
Help.
[/quote][quote author=young pure42 link=topic=449836.msg3300020#msg3300020 date=1281227956]

Check Wearing class.

	String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID);
	if (ItemName.startsWith("Thieving cape")) {
		return 99;
	}
	if (ItemName.startsWith("Thieving hood")) {
		return 99;
	}

[/quote]
I’m taking it as you two are the same person?[/quote]
No just friends making a server but no1 will help us.

Read full topic
